sentences.sContent: The rebels retreated to the mountains.
They were attacked and forced to retreat.
sentences.sCn: 他们受到攻击，被迫撤退。

remMethod.val: re(向后) + treat(=tract, 拉拽) → 向后拉 → 撤退

trans.tranCn: 退却，撤退；逃避，躲避；退缩
trans.tranOther: to move away from the enemy after being defeated in battle

trans.tranCn: 退却， 撤退； 逃避， 躲避； 退缩； 隐静居处， 僻静处
trans.tranOther: a movement away from the enemy after a defeat in battle
